description: Nim-values from game of Kopper's Nim.
comments: Rows/columns 1-10 are A007814, A050603, A053399, A053384-A053890.Comment from R. K. Guy: David Singmaster (zingmast(AT)sbu.ac.uk) sent me, about 5 years ago, a game he'd received from Bodo Koppers. It is played with two heaps of beans. The move is to remove one heap and split the other into two nonempty heaps. I'm not sure if Koppers invented it, or got it from elsewhere. I do not think that he analyzed it, but Singmaster did.
